meta.title: My Mechanicsville Memories
meta.subtitle: Story of the river and its gorge
meta.author: Meranda Gallupe-Paton
meta.description: An auto-ethnographic digital history story by Meranda Gallupe-Paton about place-based memories in Mechanicsville, an Ottawa neighbourhood in the throes of gentrification.

imagebackground.title: My Mechanicsville Memories
imagebackground.subtitle: An Auto-Ethnographic Digital History Story by Meranda Gallupe-Paton
imagebackground.text: This story uses text, photos, videos, and audio. To get the full immersive effect of the story, it is recommended you listen with headphones. Sit an listen for a bit before scrolling.

textcentred.title: The Place
textcentred.intro:
This project focus on the history and place memories of Mechanicsville, a once working-class neighbourhood in Ottawa currently in the throes of gentrification. This is not the Mechanicsville in my memories. 

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/d/u/0/embed?mid=1ZgfCu_Ko2rJwbjM6-2Kj09ojY23xz_9a" width="640" height="480"></iframe>

A place that mainly now exists in memory, not many photos of what I will be describing so I'll show what is there now and tell you what I remember.
